title: abstract protocol
extract: Abstract. ... There is a need to abstract away from some of the messy implementation details of buffer management, data representation and specific APIs. However, in order to describe the behaviour of a protocol one has to establish a set of (useful) concepts that can be used in that description.Feb 20, 2003

However, in order to describe the behaviour of a protocol one has to establish a set of (useful) concepts that can be used in that description.Feb 20, 2003
